room_title: Escape room "The Firestarter" by The Final Clue in Portage
room_description: An unknown serial arsonist is targeting colleges and now he has his sights set on Kalamazoo! You are on campus when lock-down procedures are initiated. With only 60 minutes, are you smart enough to disrupt his plan, master his riddles and solve the final clue to escape? Or, will you get burned by the Firestarter?
